## DependencyStrategy enum

NPM package dependency strategy

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum DependencyStrategy 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  any | <code>&quot;any&quot;</code> | <code>*</code> - Matches any version <code>&quot;&quot;</code> (just an empty string) is same as <code>*</code> |
|  approximate | <code>&quot;approximate&quot;</code> | <code>~version</code> - "Approximately equivalent to version". See [semver](https://github.com/npm/node-semver#versions) |
|  compatible | <code>&quot;compatible&quot;</code> | <code>^version</code> - "Compatible with version". See [semver](https://github.com/npm/node-semver#versions)<!-- -->. |
|  dotX | <code>&quot;dotX&quot;</code> | <code>1.2.x</code> - <code>1.2.0</code>, <code>1.2.1</code>, etc., but not <code>1.3.0</code> |
|  exact | <code>&quot;exact&quot;</code> | <code>version</code> - Must match version exactly |
|  git | <code>&quot;git&quot;</code> | <code>git:...</code> - See [Git URLs as Dependencies](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v7/configuring-npm/package-json#git-urls-as-dependencies) |
|  github | <code>&quot;github&quot;</code> | <code>github:user/repo</code> - See [GitHub URLs](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v7/configuring-npm/package-json#github-urls) |
|  greater | <code>&quot;greater&quot;</code> | <code>&gt;version</code> - Must be greater than version |
|  greaterOrEqual | <code>&quot;greaterOrEqual&quot;</code> | <code>&gt;=version</code> - Must be greater or equal than version |
|  local | <code>&quot;local&quot;</code> | <code>file:path/path/path</code> - See [Local Paths](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v7/configuring-npm/package-json#local-paths) |
|  pnpmWorkspace | <code>&quot;pnpmWorkspace&quot;</code> | <code>workspace:...</code> - A [PNPM workspace](https://pnpm.io/workspaces) |
|  range | <code>&quot;range&quot;</code> | <code>version1 - version2</code> - Same as <code>&gt;=version1 &lt;=version2</code> <code>range1 &#124;&#124; range2</code> - Passes if either range1 or range2 are satisfied. |
|  smaller | <code>&quot;smaller&quot;</code> | <code>&lt;version</code> - Must be smaller than version |
|  smallerOrEqual | <code>&quot;smallerOrEqual&quot;</code> | <code>&lt;=version</code> - Must be smaller or equal than version |
|  tag | <code>&quot;tag&quot;</code> | <code>tag</code> - A specific version tagged and published as tag. See [npm dist-tag](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v7/commands/npm-dist-tag) |
|  url | <code>&quot;url&quot;</code> | <code>http://...</code> - See [URLs as Dependencies](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v7/configuring-npm/package-json#urls-as-dependencies) |

## Remarks

Most guidelines have been taken from [NPM \`package.json\` documentation](https://docs.npmjs.com/cli/v7/configuring-npm/package-json#dependencies)
